QuestData.Title: Her Lady's Hand
QuestData.Description: Battlemaiden!$B$BFind my Honor Guard upon the field of battle and relieve them of their foes. I need them to return to guard the priestesses immediately!$B$BI will hold the entrance. Be swift!
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat the opponents of 8 Naz'jar Honor Guard on the field of battle and deliver their new orders.$B$BThis task is part of a Naz'jar Battlemaiden vision. If needed, use the Blade of the Naz'jar Battlemaiden at a time focus to return to the vision.
QuestData.CompletionText: I dispatched my Honor Guard when the fighting broke out. They are better equipped to deal with the chaos of this kind of battle, and I am hardly in need of their aid.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, Battlemaiden.$B$BI will attend to the eastern bridge. I need you to attend to the temple itself. The ritual must not be interrupted.
